{{Wired embedded system |brand=Rosewill |model=RPLC-500 |revision= |upc=898745061130 |asin=B00AWU9BTE |est_release_date=2013-01-07 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=NuCom |manuf_model=NU-5P12A |manuf_rev=-3-EU |availability= |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.08 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7400 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8021 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=HomePlug AFE/Line Driver;Atheros;AR1500;;1; |flags=HomePlug AV, AV500, |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=68:1C:A2 }} {{TagLine|500Mbps Powerline Gigabit Ethernet Adapter}} :[http://rosewill.com/products/2394/ProductDetail_Overview.htm Product page]
The manual and QIG for the device are dated 2013-01-07.
*[http://bcchardware.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=12516:rosewill-rplc-500-500mbps-powerline-networking-kit&catid=95:networking&Itemid=82 ''Rosewill RPLC-500'' review on ''BCC Hardware''] :Chipset: [[Atheros]] AR7400+AR1500
